mapper.sql: a.id as id, a.key_id as keyId, a.key_group as keyGroup, a.key_value as keyValue, a.is_del as isDel, a.note as note, a.pid as pid, a.seq as seq, a.ext1 as ext1, a.ext2 as ext2, a.corp_id as corpId
mapper.select:
select
from tb_dict a where a.id = #{id};

select
from tb_dict a where 1=1 and a.is_del=0
and a.key_group!='feather_price' and a.key_group!='FEATHER_TYPE' and a.key_group!='num_tags'
and a.key_id like "%"#{param.keyId}"%"
and a.key_value like "%"#{param.keyValue}"%"
and a.key_group like "%"#{param.keyGroup}"%"
and a.note like "%"#{param.note}"%"
and a.corp_id = #{param.corpId}
order by a.key_group, a.seq
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_dict( id, key_id, key_group, key_value, is_del, note, pid, seq ) values
( #{dict.id}, #{dict.keyId}, #{dict.keyGroup}, #{dict.keyValue}, #{dict.isDel}, #{dict.note}, #{dict.pid}, #{dict.seq} )
mapper.update: update tb_dict a set a.key_id = #{keyId}, a.key_group = #{keyGroup}, a.key_value = #{keyValue}, a.is_del = #{isDel}, a.note = #{note}, a.pid = #{pid}, a.seq = #{seq} where a.id = #{id}
update tb_dict a set a.is_del = 1 where a.id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count(1) as num from tb_dict a where a.id != #{id} and a.key_id = #{keyId} and a.key_group = #{keyGroup}

select
from tb_dict a where a.key_group = #{keyGroup} order by a.seq desc limit 1
select * from tb_dict a where a.is_del = 0 and a.key_group = #{keyGroup} order by a.seq asc
select * from tb_dict a where a.is_del = 0 and a.key_group = #{keyGroup} and a.corp_id = #{corpId} order by a.seq asc
select a.gtp_group, b.key_id, b.key_value, b.key_group from tb_goods_type_property a left join tb_dict b on a.gtp_dict_group_key = b.key_group where a.g_type2 = #{keyGroup} order by a.seq, b.seq asc
select ifnull(max(d.seq),0) seq, ifnull(max(cast(d.key_id as UNSIGNED INTEGER)),0) keyId from tb_dict d where d.key_group=#{keyGroup}
